activities.loc: Br I Courtroom, 3rd Fl, Oneida County Courthouse

result.execSummary:
The defendant Kevin G. Gravitter was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Kevin G. Gravitter is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Kevin G. Gravitter was found guilty of Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal 4th+), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 343.44(1)(b).
  • Kevin G. Gravitter was found guilty of Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

1:56 PM Prosecuting attorney Jillian Pfeifer in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Kevin G. Gravitter not in court.  Attorney Breanna Magallones in court for Kevin G. Gravitter. 
Also calling 22tr250-252.

Calling 22CM33 & 22TR250 - 22TR252. Magallones states offer was received - Defendant is not accepting - needs license - would like to set out. Defendant statement to amount owed. 1:34 PM Prosecuting attorney Michael William Schiek appeared in court for the State of Wisconsin, Defendant Kevin G. Gravitter appeared by video, in custody. Calling 22CM33, 22TR250, 22TR251 & 22TR252. In receipt of complaint, right to counsel. Defendant/Schiek statement to bail. Court questions Defendant on employment/residence/address. Court questions Schiek on address. Court questions Defendant on prior bond form addresses. Court states Defendant has active warrants out of Langlade County. Court sets bond. adj. 01:44 PM
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for February 7, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
